title: Whatsapp group for fresher
content: Is there any whatsapp group for freshers. Kindly provide link

comments.body: Go to the Pesu Discord server (link given in FAQs post) and then search "WhatsApp" in the lobby.
I am getting error "Unable to accept invite" in Discord
try using the link I sent you
please DM me the link. ill be joining through KCET round 2(AIML)
Depends on your branch. And doesn't your class have a group Whatsapp or something. For Biotech they do...and a biotech specific group for official posts like opportunities and such.
Can someone pls dm me the link for freshers '28 group
